p: Thus, the author team conducted the process of confirming the accepted botanical names in order of the databases with the most updated entries: Kew-MPNS, followed by WCSP, WFO, and FoC. Most names in the dataset were confirmed by MPNS and WFO. Assessing the chronological bibliography and publication of names relied on references from the Plants of the World Online (POWO) [31] and International Plant Names Index (IPNI) databases, respectively. POWO and IPNI are bibliographic resources which provide full original publication details for a recognized botanical name.
